abstract: World Anti-Doping Agency is asked to investigate its laboratory in Rio de Janiero after it mistakenly reported that a Brazilian beach volleyball player tested positive for doping.
snippet: The World Anti-Doping Agency has been asked to investigate its laboratory in Rio de Janeiro after it mistakenly reported that a Brazilian beach volleyball player tested positive for doping.
lead_paragraph: The World Anti-Doping Agency has been asked to investigate its laboratory in Rio de Janeiro after it mistakenly reported that a Brazilian beach volleyball player tested positive for doping.
